ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Janak Dahal has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. During his last employment he was working as a Sr. Unix/Linux Engineer at Cox Communications. Janak has extensive knowledge of Linux, AIX UNIX, Linux Red Hat, Sun Solaris, VMware, Apache WEB Server, Veritas Volume Manager, Veritas NetBackup, UNIX, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Oracle, IBM Hardware, SUN Hardware, SAN, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, HACMP, Oracle 9i, Oracle 10G, Network File System, MySQL, IBM RS6000 Hardware, Dell Server Hardware, Veritas Cluster, SUN Hardware > Sun Enterprise Servers, Jboss, IBM WebSphere, IBM Hardware > IBM BladeCenter, HP-UX, Domain Name Server Protocol, DB2, shell scripting, TCP/IP, SunOS, SUN Hardware > Sun SPARC series, IBM WebSphere Application Server, IBM Hardware > IBM System x, HP Hardware, workstation pro, Veritas File System, Ultra, Sybase, SLES 9, 10, RAID, Personal Home Page, Network Attached Storage, NIS, LDAP, CLARiiON, C Programming Language, Apple Mac, XEN, X Windows, UML/OMT, Samba, SWAP, SMTP, Proliant, POP, MQ V5.3, V6.0, Linux Fedora, LAMP, Korn Shell, Java Servlets, Java Server Pages, IBM Tivoli Management Framework > Tivoli Service Desk, IBM Hardware > IBM pSeries, IBM AS400 Hardware, HP Server Hardware, EMC Symmetric. So far Janak has not gained any managerial experience.
